attr.title: Binky's Trash Service
attr.desc: Storm evil lairs ... and take out the trash! Play as BINKY in a perilous, precision platformer where you run a garbage collection service for EVIL LAIRS! Optimise your speedrun strats and empty all the trash in 15 unique and colourful mini-Metroidvania maps!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from itch.io (https://ondydev.itch.io/binkys-trash-service). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the binkystrashservice/assets directory.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [itch.io](https://ondydev.itch.io/binkys-trash-service). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the `binkystrashservice/assets` directory.
